About the Author

Raginii Uplopwar has dedicated over 20 years to mastering and teaching the integration of ancient Eastern wisdom with modern Western healing approaches. Her six published books have guided thousands of readers on their journey to personal transformation, spiritual awakening, and practical success in life and business.
